name: The Invincible Lion

specials.name: Pounce
specials.description: % Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the lion began this action hidden, it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike.

specials.name: Topple
specials.description: % Strides and makes a Trip attempt at the end of that movement.

specials.name: Pack Attack
specials.description: The lion deals 1d4 extra damage to any creature that's within reach of at least two of the lion's allies.

specials.name: Sneak Attack
specials.description: The lion deals 1d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

specials.name: Favored Terrain
specials.description: As long as % is in their favored terrain, when in that terrain, they can ignore the effects of non-magical difficult terrain. Their favored terrain is usually where they live.

specials.name: Form of the Curse
specials.description: % cannot initiate the Form of the Curse unless they have less than 25 HP.  Transform into a horrible undead creature, bones ripping from the seams  and losing any hope of living they once had as they give into their curse and take an undead form, giving them different defenses and allowing the use of abilities with the Form of the Curse trait. Once the Form of the Curse has been taken, it is irreversible and % gains 15 temporary Hit Points.

specials.name: Bowel Grab
specials.description:
%'s guts reach out like rope and makes a grapple attempt on an opponent up to 15 feet away. 
Success as Grapple, but add 1d12 persistent bleed damage to the grabbed creature. This damage does not get increased by a critical success.

items: The Invincible Lion's Pelt, The Invincible Lion's Soul

resistance.value: before transformation: physical 6 (overcome by critical hits); after transformation: cold 4, electricity 4, fire 4, piercing 4

weakness.value: before transformation: fire 4, acid 4, electric 4, cold 4; after transformation positive 6, fire 6

immunity.value: before transformation: death effects, disease, paralyzed, unconscious; after transformation: add mental, poison
